casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Heddleson v. Bradshaw, Warden.

[Cite as State ex rel. Heddleson v. Bradshaw, 102 Ohio St.3d 90, 2004-Ohio-2000.]

(No. 2003-2039 Submitted April 14, 2004 Decided May 5, 2004.) Kravitz & Kravitz, L.L.C., and Kort Gatterdam, for relator.

{¶ 1} The petition for a writ of habeas corpus is dismissed on the authority of Pratts v. Hurley, 102 Ohio St.3d 81, 2004-0hio-1980, 806 N.E.2d 992.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur.
